duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and manufacture plastic disposable kit products for regulated industries.
Ensure compliance with relevant regulations for product submission in the US and European markets.
Utilize SolidWorks and FEA software for 3D CAD design and modeling.
Perform product verification activities and report on the findings.
Develop manufacturing processes associated with medical device or biological applications.
Apply knowledge of plastic biocompatibility, leachable & extractable, and sterilization techniques.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree or equivalent in related scientific or engineering fields (mechanic, micro- mechanics).
